name: Hit Me! (Kael, darkdiei, taleco-o-unico, hidekihhs)
description:
How good are you are dodgeball? Avoid being hit and try to grab the balls that are thrown at you to throw them back at your enemies!

Use WASD or the ARROWS to move.
Use your mouse to aim and HOLD the LEFT BUTTON to grab a ball. RELEASE THE BUTTON to throw it.
Use SPACEBAR or RIGHT CLICK to dash.

Game created for Vetelino's Summer Jam - June 2022.

Have fun!

ART:
Henrique Hideki
Iara Jane (darkdiei)

AUDIO:
Miguel Rodrigues (kaelgeass)

PROGRAMMING:
Miguel Rodrigues (kaelgeass)
Thales Bacelar (taleco-o-unico)
